item.title: Local WordPress with MAMP!
item.description: I no longer use MAMP, I suggest checking out something like VVV, or Trellis. This quick post will explain how to quickly and easily get a local development environment up and running on your Mac, using a free tool called MAMP. With MAMP, youâ€™ll be able to work on WordPress, or Drupal, or Joomla (hark!), or any similar software from the comfort of your own computer, no web host needed.
